Title: Echoes of Concrete
Description: Urban sound collage paired with abstract architectural imagery exploring memory and displacement in Toronto spaces
Keywords: urban memory; sound art; experimental film

Title: Static Bloom
Description: Layered analog glitch projection recorded digitally examining technological decay and visual noise

Title: Northern Pulse
Description: Experimental montage reflecting environmental rhythms and seasonal cycles in Northern Canada

Title: Soft Signals
Description: Exploration of signal interference through layered broadcast fragments and manipulated audio textures

Title: Afterimage Drift
Description: Visual meditation using slowed motion urban footage to explore memory persistence

Title: Glass Frequency
Description: Installation-based experimental piece examining reflection, refraction, and sonic resonance

Title: Fragment Loop
Description: Looped structural film composed of fragmented motion studies

Title: Signal Garden
Description: Analog video textures blended with digital compositing exploring artificial ecosystems

Title: Silent Transit
Description: Observational experimental film documenting commuter movement through rhythmic editing

Title: Chromatic Field
Description: Color field abstraction exploring saturation, flicker, and perceptual thresholds

Title: The Top of His Head
Description: Experimental narrative feature blending music, dream logic, and Toronto urban imagery

Title: Crime Wave
Description: Surreal comedic feature emblematic of Toronto underground cinema

Title: Scissere
Description: Early experimental short exploring voyeurism and media fragmentation

Title: You Killed Me First
Description: Punk-influenced feminist short from Toronto underground film culture
